NIOP-E, Sta. 723: Seychelles, Bird Island, off N coast; 3°42'S 55°12'E; coral reef, near drop-off; depth: 10 m; scuba-diving; on holothurian (Stichopodidae), Thelenota ananas (Jaeger, 1833); 21.xii.1992; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.

NIOP-E, Sta. 780: Seychelles, Poivre atoll, W rim; 5°46'S 53°18'E; reef slope, depth: 15 m; scuba diving; on thread-like antipatharian host;1.I.1993; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.

NIOP-E, Sta. 788: Seychelles, Alphonse atoll, SE part of lagoon; 7°02'S 52°44'E; reef flat and patch reefs, down to 8 m; snorkeling & scuba diving, transects 19 & 21; 4/6.i.93; in Pinctada margaritifera pearl-oysters.

NIOP-E, Sta. 612: Seychelles, Mahé, E coast, Cap Maçons /Anse de Forbans; 04°46'S 55°31'E; depth 3-5 m, tidal reef flat and slightly declining reef slope; snorkeling; 12.xii.1992; in Pinctada margaritifera pearl-oyster; collected by B.W. Hoeksema.
